32#ifndef _DRM_BUS_DMA_HACKS_H_
33#define _DRM_BUS_DMA_HACKS_H_
34
35#include <sys/cdefs.h>
36#include <sys/bus.h>
37#include <sys/kmem.h>
38#include <sys/queue.h>
39
40#include <uvm/uvm.h>
41#include <uvm/uvm_extern.h>
42
43#if defined(__i386__) || defined(__x86_64__)
44# include <x86/bus_private.h>
45# include <x86/machdep.h>
46# define PHYS_TO_BUS_MEM(dmat, paddr) ((bus_addr_t)(paddr))
47# define BUS_MEM_TO_PHYS(dmat, baddr) ((paddr_t)(baddr))
48#elif defined(__arm__) || defined(__aarch64__)
49static inline bus_addr_t
50PHYS_TO_BUS_MEM(bus_dma_tag_t dmat, paddr_t pa)
51{
52 unsigned i;
53
54 for (i = 0; i < dmat->_nranges; i++) {
55 const struct arm32_dma_range *dr = &dmat->_ranges[i];
56
57 if (dr->dr_sysbase <= pa && pa - dr->dr_sysbase <= dr->dr_len)
58 return dr->dr_busbase + (dr->dr_sysbase - pa);
59 }
60 panic("paddr has no bus address in dma tag %p: %"PRIxPADDR, dmat, pa);
61}
62static inline paddr_t
63BUS_MEM_TO_PHYS(bus_dma_tag_t dmat, bus_addr_t ba)
64{
65 unsigned i;
66
67 for (i = 0; i < dmat->_nranges; i++) {
68 const struct arm32_dma_range *dr = &dmat->_ranges[i];
69
70 if (dr->dr_busbase <= ba && ba - dr->dr_busbase <= dr->dr_len)
71 return dr->dr_sysbase + (dr->dr_busbase - ba);
72 }
73 panic("bus addr has no bus address in dma tag %p: %"PRIxPADDR, dmat,
74 ba);
75}
76#elif defined(__sparc__) || defined(__sparc64__)
77# define PHYS_TO_BUS_MEM(dmat, paddr) ((bus_addr_t)(paddr))
78# define BUS_MEM_TO_PHYS(dmat, baddr) ((paddr_t)(baddr))
79#elif defined(__powerpc__)
80#else
81# error DRM GEM/TTM need new MI bus_dma APIs! Halp!
82#endif
83
84static inline int
85bus_dmamem_pgfl(bus_dma_tag_t tag)
86{
87#if defined(__i386__) || defined(__x86_64__)
88 return x86_select_freelist(tag->_bounce_alloc_hi - 1);
89#else
90 return VM_FREELIST_DEFAULT;
91#endif
92}
93
94static inline bool
95bus_dmatag_bounces_paddr(bus_dma_tag_t dmat, paddr_t pa)
96{
97#if defined(__i386__) || defined(__x86_64__)
98 return pa < dmat->_bounce_alloc_lo || dmat->_bounce_alloc_hi <= pa;
99#elif defined(__arm__) || defined(__aarch64__)
100 unsigned i;
101
102 for (i = 0; i < dmat->_nranges; i++) {
103 const struct arm32_dma_range *dr = &dmat->_ranges[i];
104 if (dr->dr_sysbase <= pa && pa - dr->dr_sysbase <= dr->dr_len)
105 return false;
106 }
107 return true;
108#elif defined(__powerpc__)
109 return dmat->_bounce_thresh && pa >= dmat->_bounce_thresh;
110#elif defined(__sparc__) || defined(__sparc64__)
111 return false; /* no bounce buffers ever */
112#endif
113}
114
115static inline int
116bus_dmamap_load_pglist(bus_dma_tag_t tag, bus_dmamap_t map,
117 struct pglist *pglist, bus_size_t size, int flags)
118{
119 km_flag_t kmflags;
120 bus_dma_segment_t *segs;
121 int nsegs, seg;
122 struct vm_page *page;
123 int error;
124
125 nsegs = 0;
126 TAILQ_FOREACH(page, pglist, pageq.queue) {
127 if (nsegs == MIN(INT_MAX, (SIZE_MAX / sizeof(segs[0]))))
128 return ENOMEM;
129 nsegs++;
130 }
131
132 KASSERT(nsegs <= (SIZE_MAX / sizeof(segs[0])));
133 switch (flags & (BUS_DMA_WAITOK|BUS_DMA_NOWAIT)) {
134 case BUS_DMA_WAITOK: kmflags = KM_SLEEP; break;
135 case BUS_DMA_NOWAIT: kmflags = KM_NOSLEEP; break;
136 default: panic("invalid flags: %d", flags);
137 }
138 segs = kmem_alloc((nsegs * sizeof(segs[0])), kmflags);
139 if (segs == NULL)
140 return ENOMEM;
141
142 seg = 0;
143 TAILQ_FOREACH(page, pglist, pageq.queue) {
144 paddr_t paddr = VM_PAGE_TO_PHYS(page);
145 bus_addr_t baddr = PHYS_TO_BUS_MEM(tag, paddr);
146
147 segs[seg].ds_addr = baddr;
148 segs[seg].ds_len = PAGE_SIZE;
149 seg++;
150 }
151
152 error = bus_dmamap_load_raw(tag, map, segs, nsegs, size, flags);
153 if (error)
154 goto fail0;
155
156 /* Success! */
157 error = 0;
158 goto out;
159
160fail1: __unused
161 bus_dmamap_unload(tag, map);
162fail0: KASSERT(error);
163out: kmem_free(segs, (nsegs * sizeof(segs[0])));
164 return error;
165}
166
167static inline int
168bus_dmamem_export_pages(bus_dma_tag_t dmat, const bus_dma_segment_t *segs,
169 int nsegs, paddr_t *pgs, unsigned npgs)
170{
171 int seg;
172 unsigned i;
173
174 i = 0;
175 for (seg = 0; seg < nsegs; seg++) {
176 bus_addr_t baddr = segs[i].ds_addr;
177 bus_size_t len = segs[i].ds_len;
178
179 while (len >= PAGE_SIZE) {
180 paddr_t paddr = BUS_MEM_TO_PHYS(dmat, baddr);
181
182 KASSERT(i < npgs);
183 pgs[i++] = paddr;
184
185 baddr += PAGE_SIZE;
186 len -= PAGE_SIZE;
187 }
188 KASSERT(len == 0);
189 }
190 KASSERT(i == npgs);
191
192 return 0;
193}
194
195static inline int
196bus_dmamem_import_pages(bus_dma_tag_t dmat, bus_dma_segment_t *segs,
197 int nsegs, int *rsegs, const paddr_t *pgs, unsigned npgs)
198{
199 int seg;
200 unsigned i;
201
202 seg = 0;
203 for (i = 0; i < npgs; i++) {
204 paddr_t paddr = pgs[i];
205 bus_addr_t baddr = PHYS_TO_BUS_MEM(dmat, paddr);
206
207 if (seg > 0 && segs[seg - 1].ds_addr + PAGE_SIZE == baddr) {
208 segs[seg - 1].ds_len += PAGE_SIZE;
209 } else {
210 KASSERT(seg < nsegs);
211 segs[seg].ds_addr = baddr;
212 segs[seg].ds_len = PAGE_SIZE;
213 seg++;
214 KASSERT(seg <= nsegs);
215 }
216 }
217 KASSERT(seg <= nsegs);
218 *rsegs = seg;
219
220 return 0;
221}
222
223#endif /* _DRM_BUS_DMA_HACKS_H_ */
